field.name: priceId
field.remark: Pricing identifier for recurring charge, associating to PM_COMPONENT_PRODOFFER_PRICE.PRICE_ID

field.name: itemCode
field.remark:
acc_code is predefined code. Coding mode for acc_code is recommended as follows: Definition rule for item code: Code length: 7 digit ฃญ> ABCDEFG Description A. Item purpose 1 ฃญ recurring charge(associating with service ID), BC coding rule is: 00 ฃญbilling cycle charge, D coding rule is: 1 ฃญ basic charge 5 ฃญ by period Others ฃญ function fee, BC indicates service type.
2 ฃญ device chargeฃจirrelevant with service IDฃฉ BC code is resource type code
3 ฃญ toll chargeฃจparts is related with service IDฃฉ BC code is 00 or service type code
4 ฃญ service charge(associating with service ID) BC code is service type. Note: For the charge is commonly be classified as long distance call charge and local cacll charge, it is supported to add tag field in the item code table for defining additional classification rule by users. 5 ฃญ billing charge, BC coding rule is: 01 ฃญcommon billing charge 02 ฃญ advance charge 03 ฃญ advance charge (scratch card) 04 ฃญ security deposit 05 ฃญ rental fee 06 ฃญ penaltyฃจoverdue paymentฃฉ 07 ฃญ bonus 6 ฃญ free resource BC code is service type
7 ฃญ accumulation resource BC code is service type.
8 ฃญ collection fee, BC code rule is : 01 ฃญ collection fee for information fee 02 ฃญ collection fee for SP and MISC 03 ฃญ collection fee for micro-payment 04 ฃญ collection fee for BP
9 ฃญ reward BC indicates service type if no special request. Set to 00 if it is irrelevant with service. DEF. sequence number G item typeฃจfee_kindฃฉ 0 ฃญ summary item indicates the general type for the item. 1 ฃญ common item 2 ฃญ promotion item 3 ฃญ balance forward item 4 ฃญ adjustment item 5 ฃญ rebate item

field.name: accountType
field.remark: 0: reserve 1: bill running by month 2: bill running by day 3: applicable to daily bill running and monthly bill running

field.name: validCycle
field.remark: 0: take effect at current billing cycle; 1: take effect at next billing cycle.

field.name: validCount
field.remark: Value"-1" indicates no definition, value>0 indicates that it exsits definition.

field.name: prePayType
field.remark: Advance charge type: 0: charge for current month 1: charge for next month. The charge of first month is charged by accounting processing(the fee must be charged by month) 2: charge for next month. The charge of first month is charged by business operation (the fee must be charged by month) When value is "1", the tariff of recurring charge is configured by month only. Configuration by day and by half month is not supported.

field.name: calIndi
field.remark: 0: reserve 1: normal recurring charge, calculated by product usage days, 2: normal recurring charge, calculated by product provisioning days, 3: normal recurring charge, calculated by billing cycle days, 4: the charge for suspend with number occupied, calculated based on suspend days.(suspend with number occupied for whole month is the normal recurring charge), 5: calculate the charge based on combination of billing cycle and product usage days, 6: When PM_RENT_PKG_DEL. CAL_INDI is 6, recurring charge is: monthly recurring fee*(current billing cycle days-product non-usage days)/(billing cycle days-product non-usage days), 7: When PM_RENT_PKG_DEL. CAL_INDI is 7, recurring charge is: monthly recurring fee*product usage days in billing cycle/billing cycle days, 8: prorate the charge based on actual usage days. The charge is: monthly recurring fee * actual usage days/billing cycle days.

field.name: exprId
field.remark: Reference condition: 0: indicates always true It defines the rating condition for recurring charge.

field.name: priority
field.remark: The greater the value is, The higer the priority is.

field.name: useMarkerId
field.remark: One condition configuration in the related condition expression table, which is configured as marker of tariff usage days. 0: indicates that it is no relevant with user status.

field.name: segIndi
field.remark: 1: indicates rating in multiple segment based on package marker

field.name: segRep
field.remark: Applied by combining with SEG_INDI 00ฃญapply the adjusted tariff in one segment to reference item in the segment. 01ฃญadjustment in multiple segment, applicable to billing calculation, is the calculation accumulation with tariff cross multiple segment.
